Abstrak:
The author was responsible for the team which developed the DUCT
CADCAM system at the University of Cambridge and is a partner in
the firm of Weber CAM CmbH, which programs for the pattem-and
mould-making shop Firma August Weber Modellbau in Hildesheim,
Germany. This article discusses why CADCAM is so little used in the
mechanical engineering industry and why designers use CAD systems
with little understanding of CAM. Until design and manufacturing
directors have a common policy, progress will remain slow.
Kata Kunci: why CADCAM is so little used in the mechanical engineering industry
